#summary Take is a (derivation) rule compiler ands scripting engine for Java.

= Introduction =

Take consists of the following 4 parts:
# an API for animation rules that is very similar to [http://www.mandarax.org mandarax].
# a simple scripting language for derivation rules that supports annotations. 
# a compiler that can generate executable code from 
# an interface to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R2ML R2ML] that can be used to generate code from (modified) UML models that use derivation rules in order to define the semantics of derived associations and properties
